objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1a1a1a'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#333333'/></linearGradient><filter id='noise' x='0%' y='0%' width='100%' height='100%'><feTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/><feBlend mode='overlay' in='SourceGraphic'/></filter></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><g opacity='0.15' filter='url(#noise)'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#ffffff'/></g><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='100' fill='none' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><g opacity='0.4'><path d='M 540 140 L 540 940' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 140 540 L 940 540' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 240 240 L 840 840' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M 840 240 L 240 840' stroke='#505050' stroke-width='1'/></g><g opacity='0.6'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='380' fill='none' stroke='#F05A28' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='250' fill='none' stroke='#F05A28' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.05'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
Advanced X-Trans CMOS Sensor • Premium Build Quality • Multiple Control Dials
Electronic Viewfinder • Tiltable LCD Screen • Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens lineup
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative photography

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a high-end camera product as the centerpiece. The background uses a dark radial gradient with subtle geometric gridlines and circular strokes, adding depth and modernity. At the top, a small bold text layer with ID `tagline` subtly introduces urgency. Below it, a large, central heading (`heading`) boldly displays the product name in all caps with a strong, professional font. A smaller subheading (`subheading`), in a warm orange tone, effectively communicates the product’s accessibility.

The product image (`product_image`) is centered and prominent, drawing visual focus. Below the image, a concise feature summary is listed in the `description` text layer using a clean sans-serif font. The special offer is emphasized with an `price` text layer and a prominent rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with overlaid white text (`cta`). The layout is balanced, visually appealing, and designed to lead the viewer’s eye through a clear sales message.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black (#1a1a1a to #333333 gradient)
- Vivid Orange (#F05A28)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Gray (#DDDDDD)
- Deep Gray Gridlines (#505050, with 0.3 opacity)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera predominantly showcases a sleek, professional black body accented with subtle metallic reflections. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), used across the camera body to convey sophistication and durability. Metallic silver (#C0C0C0) highlights the dials and brand texts, adding contrast and modernity. Deep charcoal gray (#2E2E2E) is used for textured grip areas, enhancing depth and ergonomics. Lens glass shows tints of pale green (#A2C6B2) and amber (#D4A55D), which introduce a hint of vibrance. These colors blend seamlessly while being selectively highlighted through reflections and material finishes, ideal for a high-tech, premium-themed banner.
